name: Ringo Carr
description:
Welcome to Ringo Carr.  Take control of Perry as he drives around a ring filled planet. Avoid the rings while collecting as many signs as you can.

"WASD" for movement
"R" to Restart
"ESC" to Exit

Created for UGJ #64

Developers
LexLoco - "Spunky Dog & Environment Design"
TheDrDevin - "Cool Cat & Programmer "
Wiz_Rad - "Sounds and Music"
